hero.title: Talk to the Tower
hero.subtitle: We are morning people. How can we help?
hero.description: Whether you have a complex logistical question or just want to know if it’s cold up there, our concierge team is standing by. No bots, just humans who know the sky.

info.corporateDescription: We speak fluent "Compliance." If you need invoices (Factura Fiscal), insurance policies for your legal team, or logistics for large groups (20-100+), please use the dedicated channel below so we can route you to our Operations Director.
info.availabilityText: Availability, special dietary requests, proposal coordination, and weather checks.

locationFaq.title: Find the Globoport.
locationFaq.content:
Carretera a las Pirámides, Teotihuacán, Edo. Mex.
We are located 5 minutes from the archaeological zone.
locationFaq.ask1-answer:
Our prices vary depending on season and availability.
We recommend booking in advance.
Contact us for group rates.
locationFaq.ask2-answer:
Flights are weather dependent for safety.
We monitor conditions daily.
You will be notified if rescheduling is required.
locationFaq.ask3-answer:
Wear comfortable clothing.
Closed shoes are required.
Bring a light jacket in early mornings.
